diff_act: 1.Verify that the computed 'Message Digest' values for each control unit match the development records to ensure data integrity and consistency.
2.Compare current hash values with those documented during the development process to ensure integrity and accuracy of the system data.
3.Flag any discrepancies identified in 'Message Digest' value for further analysis and resolution.

regen.absent_element: discrepancy resolution procedure for 'Message Digest' values
regen.new_specification: The system shall flag and initiate further analysis and resolution for any discrepancies identified in 'Message Digest' values.

regen.absent_element: handling discrepancies found in 'Message Digest' verification
regen.new_specification: The system shall flag any discrepancies identified in the computed 'Message Digest' value for further analysis and resolution.

regen.absent_element: handling of discrepancies in 'Message Digest' values
regen.new_specification: The system shall flag any discrepancies identified in 'Message Digest' values for further analysis and resolution to ensure data integrity.

label: A verification failure shall will cause an alarm condition for the affected control unit.
absence: action of alarm for a verification failure
